quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Opera and Jazz
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, people, libiamo. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In which Italian opera is the famous aria Casta Diva sung?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Norma

questions.question: One thing the Blues aint is funny. Which of these performers does this quote belong to?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stephen Stills

questions.question: Jazz is the music of the body. Who said this?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anais Nin

questions.question: Libiamo nelieti calici (Drinking Song) is a famous duet with chorus from this popular opera by Verdi.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: La traviata

questions.question: What is the occupation of Floria Tosca in Giacomo Puccinis world-famous opera Tosca?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: singer

questions.question: This opera character is a Persian Princess. Any man who desires to wed her must first answer her three riddles. If he fails, he will be beheaded.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Turandot

questions.question: Which of these writers does the following quote belong to: Music is only love looking for words.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lawrence Durrell

questions.question: Which of these does the following quote belong to: Hell is full of musical amateurs.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George Bernard Shaw

questions.question: What is the Japanese name of Madame Butterfly in Puccinis self-titled opera?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cio-Cio San

questions.question: Who said: I may not be a first-class composer but I am a first-class second rate composer.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Richard Strauss

questions.question: Ive always wanted the sound of Muddy Waters early recordings  - only louder. Who said this?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eric Clapton

questions.question: What Italian opera follows the plight of the Jews as they are assaulted and subsequently exiled from their homeland by a Babylonian King?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nabucco

questions.question: Jazz will endure just as long as people hear it through their feet  instead of through their brains. Which of these men does this quote belong to?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: J. P. Sousa

questions.question: In this opera by Giuseppe Verdi an Ethiopian princess, is captured and brought into slavery in Egypt.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Aida

questions.question: In the movie Pretty Woman, Edward takes Vivian to this opera, whose plot deals with a wealthy man falling in love with a courtesan.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: La traviata

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Celine Dion and Title
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, title, shows. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Would Jesus Wear A Rolex On His Television Show? and the medicinal song Jeremiah Peabodys Polyunsaturated Quick Dissolving Fast Acting Pleasant Tasting Green and Purple Pills were penned and sung by this artist whose highest rated songs in America and Canada were Everything is Beautiful and Streak. Who is this man born in 1939?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ray Stevens

questions.question: What is the title of the first by Celine Dion which she composed when she was twelve?

options.text: The Voice of the Good God
I Have So Much Love for You

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It Was Only a Dream

questions.question: On which of these TV shows has Celine Dion made a guest appearance?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: What song did Casting Crowns win a Dove Award for?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Who Am I

questions.question: Dont Squeeze My Sharmon is the correct name of a song by this artist whose highest rated song on the country charts was Pick Me Up on Your Way Down. No he is not Cliff Arquette nor Cheyenne Bodie but think about putting them both together. Who is he?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Charlie Walker

questions.question: Celine Dions album A New Day Has Come was largely inspired by which of the following?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The birth of her son

questions.question: Celine Dion stated she was inspired by this musician in the dawn of her career, and wanted to become a star of the same magnitude.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Jackson

questions.question: What was singer Celine Dion named after?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A song

questions.question: Celine Diones music has been criticized for which of the following?

options.text: It portrayed women as weak beings.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It was too sentimental.

questions.question: Nessun Dorma (None shall sleep), one of the best-known tenor arias, is sung by Calaf, the unknown prince in this famous opera.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Turandot

questions.question: Name the Celine Dion song that became her first number one single in the United States, Australia and Canada.

options.text: Its All Coming Back to Me Now

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Power of Love

questions.question: What is the title of Celine Dions debut English album, released in 1990?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Unison

questions.question: What is the title of Celine Dions autobiographical book, published in 2001?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: My Story, My Dream

questions.question: Who composed the opera Lelisir damore (The Elixir of Love) in which a peasant boy falls in love named Nemorino falls in love with Adina, a wealthy landowner?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gaetano Donizetti

questions.question: How many octaves does Celine Dions voice encompass?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Five octaves

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Rihanna and Title

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Cannibal and Musical
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, cannibal, creators. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What condition/infection does one of the miners become a victim of in the movie Cannibal! The Musical?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gangrene

questions.question: David (Dad) from the Chuck Wagon Gang was inducted into the Gospel Music Hall of Fame in what year?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1984

questions.question: What was the name of the reporter who helped Packer in Cannibal! The Musical, and what newspaper did she work for?

options.text: Betty Baxter, The San Francisco Chronicle
Wallace Greeley, The New York Times

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Polly Pry, The Denver Post

questions.question: What is the name of Packers horse in the film Cannibal! The Musical?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lianne

questions.question: The Chuck Wagon Gang became a touring band in what year?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1948

questions.question: Cannibal! The Musical is based on the real life story of what convicted cannibal?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alferd Packer

questions.question: Complete this line from a song, featured in the movie Cannibal! The Musical:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a baked potato

questions.question: The Chuck Wagon Gang were named gospel artist or group of the year by Music City News five years in a row.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: At the beginning of the movie Cannibal! The Musical, a group of miners begin a trip on foot through the wilderness in search of gold. What is their destination?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Colorado Territory

questions.question: What kind of day do you think Packer, the protagonist of Cannibal! The Musical, would like to have?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A shpadoinkle day

questions.question: What are the names of the five miners who went on expedition with Packer in the film Cannibal! The Musical?

options.text: Jo Jo Klingensmith, Sunny California Hill, Shannon Wells, Israel Pigeon
Jimmy Hopkins, Char Texas Toast, Hacker Bill, Audrey Wilfred, Israel Bird
Jordy Calhoon, Saxton Montana Madness, Wally Guns, Israel Dove
James Humphrey, George California Noon, Shannon Bell, Israel Swan

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: James Humphrey, George California Noon, Shannon Bell, Israel Swan

questions.question: The creators of Cannibal! The Musical are also the creators of what popular cartoon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: South Park

questions.question: In 1955, who replaced David in the Chuck Wagon Gang?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eddie

questions.question: The Chuck Wagon Gangs singing career was launched by a crisis which left the family destitute.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: June Carter and her mother, Mother MayBelle Carter, were members of the Chuck Wagon Gang at one and the same time.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Line and Song
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, cannibal, line. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Complete this line from Beyonce’s ballad ‘Flaws and All’: ‘I’m a … by some standards, but in your eyes I’m a queen’?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peasant

questions.question: Complete these lyrics from Beyonce’s song ‘Crazy in Love’: ‘Such a funny thing for me to try to explain how I’m feeling, and my … is the one to blame’.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pride

questions.question: Finish this line from the song ‘Baby Boy’ by Beyonce Knowles and Sean Paul: ‘In our own little world the music is the sun, the dance floor become the sea. Feels like…’.

options.text: You’re the only one I need

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True paradise to me

questions.question: In the movie Cannibal! The Musical, what did Crazy Old Ralph say to the miners before they left?

options.text: Youre never fully dressed without a smile
Well behaved women rarely make history
Youre doomed! Doomed! Youre Doomed!  Doomed!

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Youre doomed! Doomed! Youre Doomed!  Doomed!

questions.question: Complete this line from Beyonce’s song ‘Dangerously in Love’ end: ‘Baby I love you, you are my …’
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Life

questions.question: Complete this line from Beyonce’s song ‘Naughty Girl’: ‘Baby, the minute I feel your … your vibe is just taking over me’.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Energy

questions.question: Complete the line from Beyonce Knowles’ song ‘Deja vu’: ‘Helplessly I reminisce, don’t want to …’
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Compare nobody to you

questions.question: What is the missing word from this line of the song ‘Beautiful Liar’ by Beyonce and Shakira: ‘Let’s not kill the …, let’s not start the fight’?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Karma

questions.question: Which Radiohead album was the first to debut at Number 1 in the US chart?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kid A

questions.question: In the film Cannibal! The Musical, Packer was chosen as the guide for the trip after the occurrence of this unfortunate event.

options.text: The original guide was struck by lightning.
The original guide broke his leg.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The original guide was struck by lightning.

questions.question: What song did Israel sing in Cannibal! The Musical, when desperation seized the miners?

options.text: a song about building a brick shelter
a song about building a city on rock n roll
a song about building a synagogue
a song about building a snowman

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a song about building a snowman

questions.question: In the film Cannibal! The Musical, the miners run into Cyclops and tell him that they are from Nashville.  How does Cyclops know that they are lying?

options.text: They didnt know how to country line dance.
None of them know how to start up a John Deere tractor.
They cant finish the lyrics to Dixie.
They cant ride and rope broncos.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They cant finish the lyrics to Dixie.

questions.question: Finish this line from the song ‘Me, Myself  I’ by Beyonce: ‘You said that you love me but you don’t, you family told me …’

options.text: You’re planning to leave me and move on
One day I would see it on my own
You said you will leave me all alone
You’re not always sleeping in your home

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: One day I would see it on my own

questions.question: Finish this verse from Beyonce’s popular song ‘Single Ladies’: ‘If you liked it then you shoulda…’.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Put a ring on it

questions.question: What word is missing from this line of the ballad ‘Listen’ by Beyonce Knowles: ‘I’m more than what you made of me, I found the … you think you gave to me’?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Voice

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Album and Song
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, title, director. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: This famous documentary by director Grant Gee follows the alternative rock band Radiohead on their world tour after the release of the album OK Computer.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Meeting People is Easy

questions.question: Which of these Radiohead songs contains references to The Hitchhickers Guide to the Galaxy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paranoid Android

questions.question: The song P5hng Me A*wy from Linkin Parks album Reanimation is often played at the bands concerts.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: The first track of Linkin Parks album Reanimation is entitled Opening. Which two members of Linkin Park perform on this track?

options.text: Dave Phoenix Farrell and Mike Shinoda

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dave Phoenix Farrell and Mike Shinoda

questions.question: Radiohead initially released this album as a digital download that customers could order for whatever price they decide.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In Rainbows

questions.question: The Gloaming is the alternative title of this Radiohead album and also the name of one of its tracks.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hail to the Thief

questions.question: What is the name of Radioheads vocalist Thom Yorkes first solo album?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Eraser

questions.question: Rock band Radiohead recorded the song Life in a Glasshouse in collaboration with this British jazz musician.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Humphrey Lyttelton

questions.question: The song Pts.Of.Athrty from Linkin Parks album Reanimation was released as a single with which other song from the album as its B-side?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: H! Vltg3

questions.question: The 1994 My Iron Lung EP marked the beginning of a long collaborative working relationship between Radiohead and this artist.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stanley Donwood

questions.question: The song Frgt/10 from Linkin Parks album Reanimation followed the theme of the album in collaborations with other artists. Which of these artists did Linkin Park not collaborate with on this song?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jonathan Davis

questions.question: The song Enth E Nd from Linkin Parks album Reanimation is a remix of their immensely popular song In The End. The original was mainly about failing in a relationship, focusing on how the singer screwed up. How is the theme of the remix different?

options.text: The song pins the blame of the failed relationship on the other person instead of on the singer
The song is about the singers relationship with his parents.
The song focuses on how nothing actually matters.
The song is more positive, focusing on a good relationship.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The song pins the blame of the failed relationship on the other person instead of on the singer

questions.question: To promote the release of this single, Radiohead started a competition for fans to create their own remixes of the song.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nude

questions.question: This famous producer is known for his long-running cooperation with British band Radiohead.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nigel Godrich

questions.question: The song X-Ecutioner Style from Linkin Parks album Reanimation is one of only two new full length songs on the album.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False
